text_block_list.text: McQueen, congratulations! That race…! It was amazing!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I finally won the Tennō Shō!! Now I can show this plaque to the Mejiro Family!!
I was shocked by Mejiro McQueen's display of joy.
I guess it's because the immense amount of pressure that she had on her to win has finally been lifted.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I may have gotten a little carried away. But I'm just so happy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And the only reason I was able to achieve this was because of you, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You devoted everything for me, and for that I am grateful.
I should be thanking you. Despite being inexperienced, you still followed my orders. And in the end, you gave me the best present possible, this amazing victory.
…But if I were to say that, she'd get upset and say “please have a bit more confidence in yourself.”
choice_data_list: Our reborn Sirius will continue to win!
Our reborn Sirius will continue to win!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, we'll have many more victories from now on, I'm sure of it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well, it's almost time for the Winning Live. I need to show my appreciation to everyone that came out to support me!
